tool_description: This API returns candlestick charts images (base64) so you can use them wherever you want!
title: Candlestick Chart

api_list.name: Binance charts
api_list.description: This endpoint creates candlestick charts for any cryptocurrency listed on [Binance](https://www.binance.com) that you want!

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description:
Symbol for the traiding pair

You can see every traiding pair available [here](https://coinmarketcap.com/en/exchanges/binance)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Amount of candles in the chart

- Default: 16
- Type: Integer. Maximum 1000

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description:
Time interval for each candle.

- Default: 1m

## Time intervals
- m: Minutes
- h: Hours
- d: Days
- w: Weeks
- M: Months

List of intervals:
- 1m
- 3m
- 5m
- 15m
- 30m
- 1h
- 2h
- 4h
- 6h
- 8h
- 12h
- 1d
- 3d
- 1w
- 1M

parameters.name: lastPrice
parameters.description:
The last price that the chart must have. This could be useful if there is some delay between your analysis and the call to this API, and that delay could make a difference between the numbers and the chart. If not given, the chart will be created with Binance last price

- Type: Number

utterances.utterance: Can you generate a candlestick chart for the ETHUSDT trading pair?
Show me a candlestick chart for BTCUSDT with a limit of 50 candles.
Create a candlestick chart for ADAUSDT with a 1-hour interval.
Generate a candlestick chart for XRPUSDT with a last price of 0.85.
Can you provide a candlestick chart for LTCUSDT with a 15-minute interval and a limit of 100 candles?
Show me a candlestick chart for BNBUSDT with a 1-day interval.
Generate a candlestick chart for DOGEUSDT with a last price of 0.25 and a limit of 200 candles.
Can you create a candlestick chart for SOLUSDT with a 4-hour interval?
Show me a candlestick chart for DOTUSDT with a 1-week interval and a limit of 30 candles.
Generate a candlestick chart for LINKUSDT with a last price of 15.50 and a 30-minute interval.

api_list.name: Health
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://candlestick-chart.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "candlestick-chart.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
